summary: Consume the Demio API to interact with events and reports.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose whether to interact with events or reports.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on events, such as getting an event or registering someone.

parameters.name: returnall
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Add filters to narrow down the results when getting events.

parameters.name: eventid
parameters.description: Provide the ID of the event to perform operations like getting or registering.

parameters.name: additionalfields
parameters.description: Add additional fields like active status or session ID when getting an event.

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: Enter the registrant's first name when registering for an event.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Enter the registrant's email address when registering for an event.
